name: Moon Mountain
description:
This is an entry for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 146. Theme is 'Mountain Climber'.

Master the art of precise hook throwing with a push or your finger. Reach the summit and enjoy a little salute in your honor. Get all three badges to prove that you are a worthy mountain climber!

Legend says that the top of Moon Mountain holds a secret for climbers who shoot for the magical stars...
